summary: A documentary on children of the insanely rich. Directed by one of their own, Johnson & Johnson heir, Jamie Johnson.
cast: Ivanka Trump|Georgina Bloomberg|Si Newhouse IV|Luke Weil|Cody Franchetti|Stephanie Ercklentz|Josiah Hornblower|Carlo von Zeitschel|Christina Floyd|Juliet Hartford|Peter L. Skolnik|Jamie Johnson
title: Born Rich
